languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees. The Mastiff immediately dashes to this enemy. Upon reaching them, the Mastiff makes a powerful melee attack and applies {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g}. If the targeted enemy is too far, the Mastiff spends {uip|MP|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243} MP trying to reach them.
While the Mastiff is near the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy, it makes a free melee attack against them each time the Overseer hits that enemy. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy tries to retreat, the Mastiff makes a special melee attack that has a {uip|Chance|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}% chance to cancel their movement.
Upon killing the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy, the Mastiff stays in his cell until given another order.
This ability has no cooldown but with each consequent use its cost increases by +1 AP.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees. The Mastiff immediately dashes to this enemy. Upon reaching them, the Mastiff makes a powerful melee attack and applies {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g}. If the targeted enemy is too far, the Mastiff spends {uip|MP|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243} MP trying to reach them.
While the Mastiff is near the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy, it makes a free melee attack against them each time the Overseer hits that enemy. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy tries to retreat, the Mastiff makes a special melee attack that has a {uip|Chance|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}% chance to cancel their movement.
Upon killing the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy, the Mastiff stays in his cell until given another order.
This ability has no cooldown but with each consequent use its cost increases by +1 AP.

languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает врага в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу. Если ему не хватает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф атакует врага, нанося урон, увеличенный на 50%, и накладывает на него эффект {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}. Эффект длится, пока кибермастиф и цель находятся на соседних клетках или пока ему не дана новая команда.
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Способность{/g} можно применять несколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но каждое последующее применение в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} до конца раунда.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their line of sight. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough MP, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated enemy, the cyber-mastiff makes a melee attack, dealing double damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This ability has no cooldown but each subsequent use within a single round increases its cost by +1 AP.

The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу. Если ему не хватает ОП, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф атакует врага, нанося урон, увеличенный на 50%, и накладывает на него эффект {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}. Эффект длится, пока кибермастиф и цель находятся на соседних клетках или пока ему не дана новая команда.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу. Если ему не хватает ОП, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф атакует врага, нанося урон, увеличенный на 50%, и накладывает на него эффект {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}. Эффект длится, пока кибермастиф и цель находятся на соседних клетках или пока ему не дана новая команда.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip değilse o düşmana mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, seçilen hedefe yaklaşmasıyla bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirerek +%50 daha fazla hasar verir ve {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsinde{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, o düşman ile siber mastif birbirlerine bitişik olduğu müddetçe veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli bir öncekine göre +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} artar.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli HP'ye sahip değilse o düşmana mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, seçilen hedefe yaklaşmasıyla bir yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirerek +%50 daha fazla hasar verir ve {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsinde{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, o düşman ile siber mastif birbirlerine bitişik olduğu müddetçe veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Bu kabiliyet, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.

Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli HP'ye sahip değilse o düşmana mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, seçilen hedefe yaklaşmasıyla bir yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirerek +%50 daha fazla hasar verir ve {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsinde{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, o düşman ile siber mastif birbirlerine bitişik olduğu müddetçe veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} elige un enemigo que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. El cibermastín intenta correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo. Si no tiene suficientes {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, se acerca tanto como puede. Al llegar al objetivo designado, el cibermastín realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige un +50 % de daño adicional y causa el efecto {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, que dura mientras el enemigo y el cibermastín estén adyacentes o hasta que el cibermastín reciba otra orden.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada uso durante un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} incrementa el coste en +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige un enemigo que esté dentro de su línea de visión. El cibermastín intenta correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo. Si no tiene suficientes PM, se acerca tanto como puede. Al llegar al objetivo designado, el cibermastín realiza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo que inflige un +50 % de daño adicional y causa el efecto {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, que dura mientras el enemigo y el cibermastín estén adyacentes o hasta que el cibermastín reciba otra orden.
Esta capacidad se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA.

El supervisor elige un enemigo que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. El cibermastín intenta correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo. Si no tiene suficientes {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, se acerca tanto como puede. Al llegar al objetivo designado, el cibermastín realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige un +50 % de daño adicional y causa el efecto {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, que dura mientras el enemigo y el cibermastín estén adyacentes o hasta que el cibermastín reciba otra orden.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，随后生化獒犬会冲向该名敌人。如果生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}不足，则会尽可能地靠近该敌人。当生化獒犬抵达目标身边时，会立刻进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成50%额外伤害，同时施加{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}效果。只要该敌人与生化獒犬相邻，此效果就会始终持续，直到双方不再处于相邻位置，或生化獒犬收到其他指令为止。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}合可多次使用，但在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，每次使用时消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}都会提高1点。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内的一名敌人，随后生化獒犬会冲向该名敌人。如果生化獒犬移动点数不足，则会尽可能地靠近该敌人。当生化獒犬抵达目标身边时，会立刻进行近战攻击，造成50%额外伤害，同时施加{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}效果。只要该敌人与生化獒犬相邻，此效果就会始终持续，直到双方不再处于相邻位置，或生化獒犬收到其他指令为止。
此能力每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。

监察官选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，随后生化獒犬会冲向该名敌人。如果生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}不足，则会尽可能地靠近该敌人。当生化獒犬抵达目标身边时，会立刻进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成50%额外伤害，同时施加{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}效果。只要该敌人与生化獒犬相邻，此效果就会始终持续，直到双方不再处于相邻位置，或生化獒犬收到其他指令为止。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}都会提高1点。

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt einen Gegner in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g}. Der Cyber-Mastiff versucht sofort, zu diesem Gegner zu laufen. Hat er nicht genügend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, bewegt er sich so nahe wie möglich zu diesem Gegner. Erreicht er das anvisierte Ziel, führt der Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} durch, der +50 % mehr Schaden verursacht und den Effekt {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Gefasst{/g} auslöst, der anhält, solange Gegner und Cyber-Mastiff angrenzend sind oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhöht die Kosten um +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seinem Sichtfeld. Der Cyber-Mastiff versucht sofort, zu diesem Gegner zu laufen. Hat er nicht genügend BP, bewegt er sich so nahe wie möglich zu diesem Gegner. Erreicht er das anvisierte Ziel, führt der Cyber-Mastiff einen Nahkampfangriff durch, der +50 % mehr Schaden verursacht und den Effekt {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Gefasst{/g} auslöst, der anhält, solange Gegner und Cyber-Mastiff angrenzend sind oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz in einer Runde erhöht die Kosten um +1 AP.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g}. Der Cyber-Mastiff versucht sofort, zu diesem Gegner zu laufen. Hat er nicht genügend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, bewegt er sich so nahe wie möglich zu diesem Gegner. Erreicht er das anvisierte Ziel, führt der Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} durch, der +50 % mehr Schaden verursacht und den Effekt {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Gefasst{/g} auslöst, der anhält, solange Gegner und Cyber-Mastiff angrenzend sind oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz in einer Runde erhöht die Kosten um +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g}. Der Cyber-Mastiff versucht sofort, zu diesem Gegner zu laufen. Hat er nicht genügend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, bewegt er sich so nahe wie möglich zu diesem Gegner. Erreicht er das anvisierte Ziel, führt der Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} durch, der +50 % mehr Schaden verursacht und den Effekt {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Gefasst{/g} auslöst, der anhält, solange Gegner und Cyber-Mastiff angrenzend sind oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz in einer Runde erhöht die Kosten um +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} choisit un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint la cible désignée, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Appréhendé{/g}, qui durera tant que l'ennemi sera adjacent au cyber-mastiff, ou jusqu'à ce que ce dernier reçoive un autre ordre.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} augmente son coût de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant choisit un ennemi dans sa ligne de mire, que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de PD, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint la cible désignée, le cyber-mastiff exécute une attaque de mêlée qui inflige +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Appréhendé{/g}, qui durera tant que l'ennemi sera adjacent au cyber-mastiff, ou jusqu'à ce que ce dernier reçoive un autre ordre.
Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA.

Le surveillant choisit un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint la cible désignée, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Appréhendé{/g}, qui durera tant que l'ennemi sera adjacent au cyber-mastiff, ou jusqu'à ce que ce dernier reçoive un autre ordre.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Le surveillant choisit un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint la cible désignée, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Appréhendé{/g}, qui durera tant que l'ennemi sera adjacent au cyber-mastiff, ou jusqu'à ce que ce dernier reçoive un autre ordre.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は、 {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその敵に向かって走る。十分な{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}がない場合、可能な限りその敵に近づくように移動する。指定されたターゲットに到達すると、サイバーマスチフは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、+50%のダメージを与え、{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}効果を付与する。この効果は、敵とサイバーマスチフが隣接している間、または別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用できるが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内で使用するたびにコストが+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}増える。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that enemy. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that enemy as possible. Upon reaching the designated target, the cyber-mastiff makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, dealing +50% more damage and inflicting the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} effect, which lasts as long as the enemy and the cyber-mastiff are adjacent to each other or until another order is given.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
監督者は、視線の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその敵に向かって走る。十分なMPがない場合、可能な限りその敵に近づくように移動する。指定されたターゲットに到達すると、サイバーマスチフは近接攻撃を行い、+50%のダメージを与え、{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}効果を付与する。この効果は、敵とサイバーマスチフが隣接している間、または別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
このアビリティを1ターンに複数回使用できるが、1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。

監督者は、視線の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその敵に向かって走る。十分なMPがない場合、可能な限りその敵に近づくように移動する。指定されたターゲットに到達すると、サイバーマスチフは近接攻撃を行い、+50%のダメージを与え、{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}効果を付与する。この効果は、敵とサイバーマスチフが隣接している間、または別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
このアビリティを1ターンに複数回使用できるが、1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。
